title: Release the Wolves
description: Virginia Duncan at Greenwillow, in a six-figure deal, has bought fantasy Release the Wolves by PW Flying Starts author Stefan Bachmann (The Peculiar). The book is set in a conquered land where every few generations hordes of bloodthirsty monsters are unleashed in an attempt to keep the population subdued; the hero is a young hunter trying to find his sister and possibly start a rebellion. The book is set to publish in 2024; Sara Megibow at kt literary sold world rights.
author: Stefan Bachmann
